post.description: Register a new user with the provided email and password.
Login endpoint for Swagger UI docs - uses OAuth2PasswordRequestForm.

Triggers re-computation of features for ALL meals in the database.

Useful for backfilling data or after changing the feature extraction logic.
Requires admin access key.

schema.title: Response Recompute All Meal Features Admin Recompute Features Post

get.description: Search users by name or email (case-insensitive, paginated).

post.description:
Upload a new profile image for the user.

Delete the old image as a background task if it exists.
Change the current user's password. Requires current password for verification.

get.description: Get personalized meal feed for the current user.

schema.title: Response Get My Feed Users Me Feed Get

post.description: Create a new place with optional images.

get.description: List places with filters and sorting.

post.description:
Create a new meal associated with a place explicitly.

A meal does not need to be neccessarily created this way, as meals can also be
created implicitly when a user submits a review for a meal that does not yet exist,
by providing the meal name and place id in the review submission.

Create a new meal review with optional images (max 5).

Either meal_id or (place_id and meal_name) must be provided to determine the meal.
If the meal does not exist when using place_id and meal_name, it will be created.

get.description: Get paginated list of reviews with filtering and sorting.

put.description: Update an existing review. Only the review creator can update.

get.description: Get detailed information about a single review.

delete.description: Delete a review. Only the review creator can delete.

get.description: Simple hello world route to test connection.

Test database connection.

Returns a success message if connection works,
or an error message if it fails.

schema.title: Response Test Db Connection Test Db Get
